name: VZMultipleDirectoryShare
desc: An object that describes a directory share for multiple directories.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes the directory share with an empty set of directories.

items.name: init(directories: [String : VZSharedDirectory])
items.desc: Creates the directory share with a set of directories on the host.

items.name: var directories: [String : VZSharedDirectory]
items.desc: The directories on the host to expose to the guest.

items.name: class func canonicalizedName(from: String) -> String?
items.desc: Transforms a string to be a valid directory name.

items.name: class func validateName(String)
items.desc: Check if a name is a valid directory name.
